alert.note: Alert for Bee; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 17 at 3:26AM CDT until March 17 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LIVE OAK AND WEST CENTRAL BEE COUNTIES... At 326 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near George West, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... George West, Three Rivers, Karon, Lagarto, Mount Lucas, Oakville, River Creek Acres and Dinero. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 44 and 70. US Highway 281 between mile markers 620 and 648. US Highway 59 between mile markers 704 and 732. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
